check.name: TypeName
check.description: Checks that type names conform to a specified pattern.

property.name: applyToPackage
property.description: Control whether we should apply the check to package-private members.

property.name: applyToPrivate
property.description: Control whether we should apply the check to private members.

property.name: applyToProtected
property.description: Control whether we should apply the check to protected members.

property.name: applyToPublic
property.description: Control whether we should apply the check to public members.

property.name: format
property.description: Sets the pattern to match valid identifiers.
